abstract: The S.E.C. ordered Finra to overhaul its internal controls after a Finra official in Kansas City altered documents amid an S.E.C. inspection.
snippet: The S.E.C. ordered Finra to overhaul its internal controls after a Finra official in Kansas City altered documents amid an S.E.C. inspection.
lead_paragraph: As a Wall Street watchdog, the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority typically dishes out sanctions and fines. Now, however, Wall Street's self-policing agency is on the receiving end of a regulatory rebuke.
